column1: 3 0 1 HI  EOS 3 1 2 [Question] Is there anything that you'd like to talk about?  EOS 3 1 3 [Affirmation and Reassurance] I am happy to listen if you have a problem.  EOS 3 0 4 Yeah its about my personal problem can you give me any suggestions  EOS 3 1 5 [Question] Well, I'd need to know what your personal problem was first. Can you tell me?  EOS 3 0 6 Im in depression over past 4 months  EOS 3 1 7 [Self-disclosure] I am very sorry to hear that. I have suffered from depression too so I empathise. Can you tell me what is making you feel depressed?
4 0 1 i feel depresed  EOS 4 1 2 [Question] Why do you feel depressed?  EOS 4 0 3 breakup with my partner  EOS 4 1 4 [Others] Breakups can be really tough. How long were you with your partner?

0 0 32 yes it can i get loud too much and my mom always yelled i hated it and told myself I hated it growing up  EOS 0 1 33 [Information] I have a co-worker who has kids with special needs, and she has this great phrase for working with her kids  EOS 0 0 34 what is it  EOS 0 0 35 i must know lol  EOS 0 0 36 any and all advice taken here  EOS 0 1 37 [Information] She says, "is this a small feeling or a big feeling?" and then, "Are you having a big reaction, or a small reaction?", and it really helps her kids self-soothe  EOS 0 0 38 interesting is she implying having a big reaction to a small feeling is unnessacary?  EOS 0 1 39 [Providing Suggestions] She's also taught them that if they're being mean to mom (taking something else out on her), they're allowed to say, "I'm sorry, I'm not acting or feeling my best right now, and I'm going to take a minute to myself." Do you think your kids might relate to that?  EOS 0 0 40 thats wise i must sit with that for a bit and at least talk about their feelings more i bet if i help my kids to feel more validated they will feel heard better and maybe not yell  EOS 0 1 41 [Providing Suggestions] Yea, exactly! Trying to teach her kids that it makes more sense for their reactions to be more proportionate to their feelings and to the importance of a situation. It's really helped her address tantrums and help her kids be more self-aware

4 0 38 Marry chrisms  EOS 4 1 39 [Question] Of course. Is there any other way I can help you? Merry Christmas to you as well, my friend!  EOS 4 0 40 And advance happy new year.  EOS 4 1 41 [Others] And to you!  EOS 4 0 42 Thank you.  EOS 4 1 43 [Question] Is there any other way I can help you today? I am here for you.  EOS 4 0 44 No friend i already have great today. I am feeling great right now.  EOS 4 1 45 [Others] I am so happy to hear that. I hope you have a great day every day!  EOS 4 0 46 Thank you.  EOS 4 1 47 [Others] Would you like me to end the chat now, my friend?

0 1 13 [Question] There is a lot of concern about, are your work following guidelines?  EOS 0 0 14 I am very anxious cause I need to run to the bathroom and breath  EOS 0 0 15 Work guidelines we are following. I want the anxiety to stop.  EOS 0 1 16 [Self-disclosure] I am also in this situation at work, I have used breathing methods to calm myself down which worked, have you tried anything like this?  EOS 0 0 17 It is simple, put on mask and work, when you get out of the office then do what you want.  EOS 0 0 18 I am anxious now and using a breathing exercise as I type  EOS 0 1 19 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] So you are frustrated because others are not using masks, have I got that right?  EOS 0 0 20 It's not that they are not using masks, it is their position and reasons not to wear the masks and that puts others in a scary and anxious position at their workplace where in these times, work is scare.  EOS 0 0 21 What is your point of view on masks?  EOS 0 1 22 [Reflection of feelings] Just from talking to you, I can feel how anxious you are and this is made worse by your colleagues, perhaps they are struggling in different ways with this.

0 0 21 u know what i bought a timer and it came in today!hopefully it will help!  EOS 0 1 22 [Others] Oh awesome! I am so glad! Maybe trying that out could be useful!  EOS 0 0 23 i have no type of supportin my life and it really does effect me  EOS 0 0 24 thanx for all your positively  EOS 0 1 25 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Having no support is so hard :( Especially during these times!  EOS 0 0 26 im gonna start again tomorrow with more faith in myself  EOS 0 1 27 [Question] Of course! Do you feel like you have people that you could reach out to if you start getting lonely?  EOS 0 0 28 u really helped my negitivity  EOS 0 1 29 [Others] That's a great idea! Just remember to be kind to yourself and take breaks when you need to!  EOS 0 1 30 [Others] Aw, I'm glad!

0 1 9 [Self-disclosure] I too, have been working from home for the past 9 months. And I am the sole provider for my family. So I understand how frustrating this can be.  EOS 0 0 10 it's great that you can relate. how are you managing those frustrations?  EOS 0 1 11 [Providing Suggestions] The key, however, is our mindset and how we approach the problem. If you are afraid about going our during peak hours, you can step outside during non-peak hours. This is just an example. Everybody's situations and preferences vary.  EOS 0 1 12 [Information] I am frustrated, but I cannot cultivate inaction. Because I have mouths to feed. So I have developed a mindset to tackle the problem by taking all the precautions I possible can.  EOS 0 0 13 so you mean maybe leave the house when it's really quiet to begin with? then slowly build on that over time. isn't this called exposure therapy. I think I have read about this  EOS 0 1 14 [Providing Suggestions] In essence, I know the factors under my control, and I try to control them and work them in my favour. I make it a point not to worry too much about factors outside my control.  EOS 0 0 15 I suppose it makes no sense to worry about things you can't control. I think from my perspective that's exactly the problem, not having control. I don't know why this has affected me so much?  EOS 0 1 16 [Reflection of feelings] Because it's a new situation to most of the world's population! People take time to adjust.  EOS 0 1 17 [Information] You take care of factors under your control - wearing a mask , social distancing when outside and washing/sanitizing hands whenever you can.  EOS 0 1 18 [Providing Suggestions] Try not to pay too much attention to factors OUTSIDE your control - how many people are there and if social distancing is followed to the letter by OTHERS

3 1 6 [Self-disclosure] you can share you problem with me freely  EOS 3 0 7 he didn't communicate....listened well but wouldn't talk or share of himself verbally...i got so frustrated  EOS 3 1 8 [Providing Suggestions] Oh ! that's very sad but try to move out from this  EOS 3 0 9 so i left....and now i miss all the good things i have lost  EOS 3 1 10 [Providing Suggestions] Try do those things that make you feel happy  EOS 3 0 11 i am depressed so it's hard to get moving on stuff i want to do...i feel so low  EOS 3 1 12 [Others] Try to live i future forget past  EOS 3 1 13 [Providing Suggestions] try to make your self happy  EOS 3 0 14 its hard to plan a future when i am grieving....i don't know how to make myself happy  EOS 3 1 15 [Others] don't be sad because of past

3 0 11 Possibly, but we weren't official boyfriend/girlfriend  EOS 3 1 12 [Question] Ah I see. How committed did you feel to her?  EOS 3 0 13 Maybe it was my indecision to ask her about our relationship  EOS 3 0 14 Now that I think about it, it seemed more of 80% me, 20% her  EOS 3 1 15 [Self-disclosure] I know, as a woman myself. that it is quite difficult when you are seeing someone but have no idea what their intentions are.  EOS 3 0 16 Sure, I guess sex and cuddling is nice, but what I really want is someone to shopping with and eventually build a future  EOS 3 1 17 [Providing Suggestions] Have you considered getting some sort of counselling, either just you or as a couple?  EOS 3 0 18 It has peaked my interest, but at the same time, I wonder how much of this is just me buried in the idea of a relationship, even though it's pretty one-sided now  EOS 3 0 19 Should I seek counseling for a relationship that technically wasn't official?  EOS 3 1 20 [Affirmation and Reassurance] I am hearing you say that you still have feelings for her but you are not sure whether to totally break away or not, given that she has

3 0 3 I just feel so sad all the time, I don't know how to snap out of it  EOS 3 1 4 [Reflection of feelings] I'm sorry you're sad. Do you know what is making you feel so sad?  EOS 3 0 5 No, there doesn't seem to be any real reason, it's just a general feeling. I think that's why I'm finding it so hard to understand what to do to make myself feel better  EOS 3 1 6 [Question] I hear you, sometimes life gets overwhelming. What has made you happy in the past?  EOS 3 0 7 I guess maybe having something to do in my spare time, I used to go to the gym a lot but now I don't. Maybe I should try doing some exercise in the evenings  EOS 3 1 8 [Providing Suggestions] Yes sometimes if you focus on a goal, you will feel accomplished, so you can focus on another goal.  EOS 3 1 9 [Question] Do you have a place where you can exercise safely in the evenings?  EOS 3 0 10 Yeah maybe. I think that's part of the problem, I have no goals, I feel like my life has no real purpose or meaning.  EOS 3 0 11 I do... I luckily live quite close to a nice cycle path that is surrounded by fields and woods  EOS 3 1 12 [Information] I bet if you try one goal, like exercise, you will be able to start on other goals and start to feel better

0 1 2 [Question] I am okay thanks. Do you have anything specific that you'd like to talk to me about?  EOS 0 0 3 yes, I'm currently under pressure to retake a work certification program that is about to expire. I'm not quite ready and I'm about losing my mind as time is fast approaching.  EOS 0 1 4 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] I see .. so you feel that you will not be able to pass this program at the current time?  EOS 0 0 5 exactly and I'm afraid of losing my license if I don't, I feel like I'm in a bind  EOS 0 1 6 [Providing Suggestions] Is there any possibility of postponing this till a later date? For one thing the world situation is very insecure at the moment and you have the right to say that you just feel that you want to self isolate right now  EOS 0 1 7 [Information] Are you a member of any sort of union that might be able to liase on your behalf? There are plenty of organisations out there  EOS 0 0 8 My biggest fear is that they are bringing in a newer version of the exam which will require a lengthy time that I don't have to prepare, I will be better off taking the current version, I feel overwhelmed  EOS 0 1 9 [Others] Okay, well, firstly I think it's a good idea to try to stay calm and not let yourself be overwhelmed. Is it possible to get any sort of tuition to prepare for the exam?  EOS 0 0 10 No I'm not. It's tough for me right now  EOS 0 1 11 [Self-disclosure] I am very sorry. I remember very well the stress of exams and the horrible feeling that you might fail.

3 1 25 [Others] I ask that about copywriting because I am on LinkedIn  EOS 3 0 26 oh, i dont use it much  EOS 3 1 27 [Providing Suggestions] There is also proofreading that can help establish yourself  EOS 3 0 28 on linkedin? really?  EOS 3 0 29 are you a machine?  EOS 3 1 30 [Affirmation and Reassurance] I use Medium and now I also have another account with them called Patreon  EOS 3 0 31 yes i know of patreon  EOS 3 1 32 [Self-disclosure] Nope i am a born again Christian  EOS 3 0 33 lol amazing  EOS 3 1 34 [Question] are you a machine

4 0 14 I have not really met anyone like a friend but I do Zoom daily with family at home.  EOS 4 0 15 I do pray alot.  EOS 4 1 16 [Affirmation and Reassurance] That is very good that you share with your family and pray if that helps you to relax.  EOS 4 0 17 I workout to relieve the stress.  EOS 4 1 18 [Reflection of feelings] And I felt the same way that COVID time is difficult to all of us  EOS 4 0 19 I am also in the healthcare field but work at home.  EOS 4 0 20 I am one of the fortunate office workers who can do this.  EOS 4 1 21 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Very good! Workout is another way to relief your stress  EOS 4 0 22 I'm so glad there is a vaccine now  EOS 4 1 23 [Affirmation and Reassurance] That is very nice. We are all hoping vaccine can relief us from anxieties.

0 1 3 [Affirmation and Reassurance] I am very sorry to hear that - I will help if I can!  EOS 0 0 4 Thank you. It is just that my job is ending soon and I have not found another.  EOS 0 1 5 [Question] Ah that must be very worrying, especially at this pandemic time. What field are you in?  EOS 0 0 6 I am in the medical field at the momnet, but the contract is going away.  EOS 0 0 7 moment"  EOS 0 1 8 [Providing Suggestions] I see. Have you already started looking for new work? It might help you feel more secure.  EOS 0 0 9 I have, but the location that I am in is scarce with work. Which is quite surprising.  EOS 0 1 10 [Information] Would you contemplate moving? I hear that there are a lot of opportunities in your field on the East Coast.  EOS 0 0 11 I would for sure, but that also makes me a bit nervous as I would not know anyone there. Thinking about all the possibilities raises my anxieties about the situation at hand and I am not sure as to what I should do  EOS 0 1 12 [Self-disclosure] I understand - I find it very difficult to meet new people too. Maybe you could join some online groups in new area before actually moving there?

4 1 18 [Information] I do not think she would respond that way at all. Once she sees that this has you concerned about your friendship, she will take it serious and open up to you.  EOS 4 0 19 You are right! thank you for the reinsurance. I hate that I am this way.  EOS 4 0 20 you have helped me so much today, thank you for helping see things differently.  EOS 4 1 21 [Others] I'm an only child as well so I understand how you are feeling :)  EOS 4 1 22 [Others] you are welcome! Glad I could help!  EOS 4 0 23 AWESOME! then you know the overwhelming need (sometimes) of being included.  EOS 4 0 24 I think I have a plan, lunch and talk to her about how I am feeling, shes always been so understanding, I miss her babies so much.  EOS 4 1 25 [Providing Suggestions] Yes! It can be frustrating at times. But it sounds like you have a plan in order. You just need to execute it.  EOS 4 0 26 Yes, I do , thank you! have a wonderful weekend.  EOS 4 1 27 [Reflection of feelings] You as well!

4 0 0 Hi  EOS 4 1 1 [Others] Helo, how are you?  EOS 4 0 2 Can't seem to shake this overall sadness I feel.  EOS 4 1 3 [Question] Are you feeling sort of depressed? I am sorry  EOS 4 0 4 Yes I am  EOS 4 1 5 [Reflection of feelings] Would you feel happy if you think about after Covid, maybe next year?  EOS 4 0 6 I am hoping I will. I just have such a hopeless feeling.  EOS 4 1 7 [Question] have you been sleeping enough?

3 0 23 so i was in home and dnt go out  EOS 3 1 24 [Affirmation and Reassurance] you shouldn't put any thoughts to those heartless comments  EOS 3 0 25 due to winter i am not doing any workouts and not yet all interested to do any  EOS 3 1 26 [Affirmation and Reassurance] If any, you can try exercising whenever possible because it's goof for your health. However, do not let the comments about your appearance affects you.  EOS 3 0 27 yeas , but sometimes we feel bad right when own people doing those comments hurts more  EOS 3 1 28 [Reflection of feelings] I understand, especially if that's someone close to you  EOS 3 0 29 yea will do slowly and thanks dear for so much concern on me  EOS 3 0 30 true , we wish our own people should understand our situation and help us to come over the problem  EOS 3 1 31 [Affirmation and Reassurance] of course, it's been very rough this year for you  EOS 3 1 32 [Others] it will get better, do not give up

1 0 5 I want to get a qualification but I'm working full-time at the moment and I also work very long hours. the problem is the courses that I want to do a huge time commitment. I'm really angry that I can't seem to get better qualifications to improve my life, because I need to work and need the income to keep me going. I feel stuck and don't know how to get past this.  EOS 1 1 6 [Reflection of feelings] Working and going to school can be tough. It must be very stressful.  EOS 1 1 7 [Question] Maybe you can take less classes or hours at work?  EOS 1 1 8 [Question] Or what are some ways you can relax after a long day?  EOS 1 0 9 you are right this is very stressful. I've gotten used to the steady income and now we lie on it. the problem is I do work quite late hours so have limited time to study. any suggestions?  EOS 1 1 10 [Others] I would ask for lesser hours if you can or study during your lunch breaks.  EOS 1 0 11 Perhaps I can ask for a different shift pattern yes, or reduce my hours. I may need to take a look at my finances and do a bit of recalculating. Have you ever had a situation like this?  EOS 1 1 12 [Self-disclosure] I have not but I know people who are in your situation.  EOS 1 0 13 I wonder if there are courses and qualifications that you can get just by studying maybe an hour a day or an hour every other day?  EOS 1 1 14 [Information] I would look on sites like Skill share.

3 0 11 I have been wanting to join the gym. Is it hard going alone or do you go with friends? I hate doing things all alone.  EOS 3 1 12 [Providing Suggestions] I like going to the gym alone but that's just my personal preference. There are fitness groups like bootcamps that you could join and meet new people. Who knows, you may meet a new friend.  EOS 3 0 13 That is a good idea. I need to be around other people who have goals like weight loss. My boyfriend never wanted me to join groups and only wanted me to be friends with his family. That is why I am so alone right now. I made bad choices.  EOS 3 1 14 [Affirmation and Reassurance] That sounds hard. You deserve to have friends of your own.  EOS 3 0 15 I agree with you. Do you think that I should try calling his friends and asking for his new number?  EOS 3 1 16 [Providing Suggestions] there are lots of different kinds of groups you can join, not just fitness. and you can choose how much you want to actively engage with them. I would suggest taking time for yourself. Maybe give yourself some distance from him. If you both decide to reach out again in the future that may be an opportunity, but definitely take care of you.  EOS 3 0 17 Yeah, I can see your point of view. I have been obsessed with our relationship. We had a fight and it was a verbal war between us and he wouldn't forgive me afterwards.  EOS 3 1 18 [Others] sometimes you just need some distance. I hate that old saying but as it goes "there are plenty of fish in the sea".  EOS 3 0 19 It is true and I am a really nice person and have turned down other guys for him. I am going to stop thinking about him and just join the gym today. You have opened my eyes!  EOS 3 1 20 [Providing Suggestions] Good luck! you got this. Have fun with it, it sounds like you have other guys who are after you ;)

3 0 4 Sure  EOS 3 0 5 my boyfriend broke up with me but won't tell me why  EOS 3 0 6 I think I posted something on fb that made him jealous. But if that is so he is being irrational.  EOS 3 1 7 [Reflection of feelings] oh, i am so sorry.  EOS 3 0 8 he won't answer my calls or messages. He keeps posting things that make it seem like I hurt him so much.  EOS 3 0 9 Thanks! :)  EOS 3 1 10 [Question] Did you try to message him to see if he can chat with you? so that you get a chance to understand what made him break up with you?  EOS 3 1 11 [Others] or do you have a common friend that can help arrange a meetup ?  EOS 3 0 12 I've send him so many messages. He reads them but won't respond. I did ask his best friend to help me but my ex pretended like nothing was wrong when his friend asked him.  EOS 3 1 13 [Providing Suggestions] Hmm. do you want to give him some time to maybe cool off and then try to get in touch with him again?

0 0 0 I am really feeling the loneliness of the season and being isolated.  EOS 0 1 1 [Others] Good evening.  EOS 0 0 2 Good evening  EOS 0 1 3 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] So just so I understand, the holiday season is making you feel alone and isolated.  EOS 0 0 4 Yes as well as the virus  EOS 0 0 5 Are we out of time  EOS 0 1 6 [Question] Is there anything in particular about the holidays that is bothering you?

4 0 3 I am glad you are doing well, I have been struggling lately as my girlfriend that I was going to propose to broke up with me. She told me that my career path was different then hers and she just did not see it working out.  EOS 4 1 4 [Question] How was your career path different?  EOS 4 1 5 [Reflection of feelings] I understand how you are feeling everything will be okay  EOS 4 0 6 She had a desire to do marine biology and I wanted to pursue law enforcement as a police officer, however due to my back injury that fell through recently. She would spend most of her time doing field work, which would require her to spend time out at sea. She was working in a nursing home at the time and was not a marine biologist.  EOS 4 1 7 [Information] She did not like your career path?  EOS 4 0 8 I am thinking that would be the case, however we dated for 3 years and then reconnecting about a year later which at this time was a distant relationship. She now has a boyfriend which she started date about 2 months she broke up with me. I found out that he works with her at the nursing home. I am unsure what to think, but she did say that she just didn't see how our career paths would work out and that was that.  EOS 4 1 9 [Others] If anything she was supposed to support whatever career path you took and that is not right  EOS 4 1 10 [Reflection of feelings] It is weird to me also how she got into another relationship fast after she broke up with you just 2 months after  EOS 4 0 11 I have had some friends echo that. I agree, it definitely felt like I was giving a lot through the time we dated. I have always wondered if this was a true statement, knowing her I think she probably got scared of what that entailed or just the distance. The new boyfriend was definitely a wild card, that I think has caused me to question her parting words  EOS 4 1 12 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Right but to be honest I would not let that stress you out or be upset about it because you do not need anybody that don't support your career

4 0 0 Hello  EOS 4 1 1 [Others] Hi  EOS 4 1 2 [Question] how are you? how it's going on?  EOS 4 0 3 I've been felling quite deppressed recently, just wanted to ask for some mental support  EOS 4 1 4 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] why are you feeling in that way? tell me what it's happening?  EOS 4 0 5 I both failed my final exam last week and my dog that I've owned for 10 years died 3 days ago  EOS 4 1 6 [Others] oh my god! I'm so sorry for that

4 0 13 Yes, I was always an honors student so this is a huge change for me. I'm afraid it will reflect on my GPA forever.  EOS 4 1 14 [Information] I know that the situation with virtual learning is out of your control when it comes to how long it will last but is there anything you could do to relieve your stress while you are trying to learn things yourself?  EOS 4 0 15 I tried exercise to see if that would help. It hasn't really helped because the time I spend exercising I just think I could be studying.  EOS 4 1 16 [Providing Suggestions] When you start feeling stressed maybe you could try deep breathing for a few minutes to relax again. Or take a quick break and get some fresh air?  EOS 4 1 17 [Others] Is there anything else that you do in any other situation that would normally help you relax?  EOS 4 0 18 I could try deep breathing. Fresh air is hard because we're in the middle of a snow storm!  EOS 4 0 19 I like to go to a spa when I'm really stressed.  EOS 4 1 20 [Providing Suggestions] Oh wow that would make things complicated! But yes the deep breathing would definitely help, I'm sure!  EOS 4 0 21 I will try the deep breathing more often.  EOS 4 1 22 [Providing Suggestions] Maybe you could reward yourself with a spa trip ever so often, since you enjoy it?

1 0 1 I am feeling okay, but I have been better  EOS 1 1 2 [Question] Is there anything specific that you'd like to talk about with me?  EOS 1 0 3 I am having a lot of conflict with my boss at work.  EOS 1 1 4 [Question] That is not good. Are you thinking of looking for new work?  EOS 1 0 5 Honestly maybe. It is exhausting  EOS 1 1 6 [Self-disclosure] I had a similar situation myself a few years ago and I moved on. I've never regretted it.
0 0 0 Hi  EOS 0 1 1 [Question] Hi! How are you feeling today?

4 1 7 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] You had so many friends in past, now you had fight with them. Hope I get it right  EOS 4 0 8 Yea kind of. They sort of drifted away.  EOS 4 0 9 I was breaking up the fights really.  EOS 4 0 10 I guess they weren't that good of friends to begin with...  EOS 4 1 11 [Others] Sorry for poor internet connection  EOS 4 0 12 THat is ok  EOS 4 0 13 What do you have to say?  EOS 4 1 14 [Affirmation and Reassurance] It must be tough time for you. Things keeps on changing. there may be some sort of misunderstanding.  EOS 4 0 15 It has been tough.  EOS 4 1 16 [Reflection of feelings] I can feel how bad or lonely you might be. It must be a stressful.

4 0 11 I have a brother, but his wife is really terrible, and they are very close. He and I text some, and I try to keep that up. He doesn't need me the way I need him...  EOS 4 1 12 [Information] What about some sort of professional therapy? There are some organisations out there that will provide a certain number of sessions for free  EOS 4 0 13 Hmm, I didn't know that. I'm on a waiting list for a therapist through my medical insurance. I live in sort of rural Oregon, but maybe I could get help by text or video...  EOS 4 1 14 [Providing Suggestions] That is a good idea, especially at this time when it's probably not a good idea to see too many new people in person. Could you call your doctor and ask them?  EOS 4 0 15 The issue is finding someone you click with. I think that's hard. I'm not sure my doctor could do much for me - she's already got me on the waiting list for therapy through her organization.  EOS 4 1 16 [Self-disclosure] Have you tried searching online? I have personally found some useful groups that have helped me deal with the mental health issues that I have.  EOS 4 0 17 If it wasn't for COVID, I'd probably look into support groups...  EOS 4 0 18 Oh yeah? Can you recommend anywhere to start?  EOS 4 1 19 [Providing Suggestions] There are plenty available online where you would not need to see anyone in person. Try googling for support groups in your local area?  EOS 4 1 20 [Others] I'd really recommend doing that, it could help you a lot! I wish you all the best and hope that 2021 is a better year for you.
4 0 1 Hello. I am okay. I have been grieving the loss of my grandmother so I've been a little down lately.  EOS 4 1 2 [Question] I am so sorry for your loss... When did this happen?

0 0 1 Hey, I'm doing well, how are you?  EOS 0 1 2 [Question] I am not so bad. Is there anything you'd like to discuss with me today?  EOS 0 0 3 Yes, I am looking for emotional support. I need to find a higher paying job.  EOS 0 1 4 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] Are you not happy in your current job? It's a bad time to be job hunting really.  EOS 0 0 5 I was unemployed all year but that is no longer an option.  EOS 0 1 6 [Question] What sort of work are you looking for? Would you be prepared to take something outside of your usual field?

5 0 3 He's all of a sudden got an opinion on everything and tries to pull me into arguments with other friends.  EOS 5 1 4 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] It sounds like he didn't use to blast his opinion in the past or include you in arguments, is that true?  EOS 5 0 5 That is true yes. It's like the world has to listen to his opinion and only his matters and he won't listen to reason. It's very frustrating and it makes me not want to talk to him. My eyes literally roll when I see a post from him.  EOS 5 1 6 [Self-disclosure] Oh I see! I get where you are coming from. I have a few friends that no matter how long you discuss, they won't let the conversation end unless "they are right." It seems like your friend doesn't like it when he is wrong?  EOS 5 0 7 Absolutely and I'm not sure how to broach this with him. I actually feel like it is damaging his reputation. Other friends of ours feel the same way. Not sure what to do?  EOS 5 1 8 [Providing Suggestions] Gotcha so not only are you frustrated with what he is doing, but you are also worried about his reputation! First of all, can I ask if he is just your friend online or if you hangout with him in person too?  EOS 5 0 9 That's correct. He is actually a close friend and I wonder what has changed recently to make him like this. I've known him for over 20 years.  EOS 5 1 10 [Others] Okay I see. From personal experience, the best way to confront someone who likes to do most of their confrontations online, is in person. Since he is so used to almost "hiding" behind a screen, his feelings will be more vulnerable and real if you discuss your concerns in person.  EOS 5 0 11 Actually I've never thought of it like that. Perhaps a couple of us can have a conversation with him in person. Honestly some off his views are disgusting. I think this needs to stop.  EOS 5 1 12 [Information] A suggestion I would make would be to hangout with him in person, and bring up the issues that you and your friends have been seeing. But it's important to not make him feel overwhelmed. Almost like he is being "ganged up on."

0 0 2 I don't know what to do. I want to quit and punch the new manager in the face.  EOS 0 1 3 [Restatement or Paraphrasing] So if I understand correctly, you are upset with your job and your manager?  EOS 0 0 4 The company mostly and myself for having to work there.  EOS 0 0 5 I can't quit because I have bills to pay and it will be hard to find other job right now.  EOS 0 1 6 [Affirmation and Reassurance] I am sorry to hear that. EOS 3 1 11 [Affirmation and Reassurance] Wow that is crazy, I don't understand how that works, is it preprogrammed or does it go by how the word sounds?  EOS 3 0 12 Each stenographer has their own "Personal Dictionary" which is a list of words in English along with how you in particular write out those words or phrases in steno. Thus your machine then knows how you write out words in particular and how to translate those words from steno to English - each stenographer writes a little differently.
